languages.text: While under the effect of any Navigator power, enemies have their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} reduced by −{uip|ResistancePenalty|79abfcdecc5f434b80214d0c8647fe3e}. This reduction is increased by the {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}devastating{/g} parameter of the Navigator's staff but does not stack.
languages.original_text: Под действием любой силы навигатора противники получают −{uip|ResistancePenalty|79abfcdecc5f434b80214d0c8647fe3e}% к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броне{/g}. Это значение увеличивается за счет параметра "{g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}разрушение{/g}" посоха навигатора, но эффект не суммируется.

traits.locale_text: While under effect of any Navigator's power, enemies have their armour reduced by −<u>2×(Navigator's WP bonus)</u>. This reduction is increased by the devastating parameter of the navigator's staff, but does not stack.

While under effect of any Navigator power, enemies have their armour reduced by −<u>(2 × Navigator's WP bonus)</u>. This reduction is increased by the devastating parameter of the navigator's staff but does not stack.

While under the effect of any Navigator power, enemies have their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} reduced by −{uip|ResistancePenalty|79abfcdecc5f434b80214d0c8647fe3e}. This reduction is increased by the {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}devastating{/g} parameter of the Navigator's staff but does not stack.

While under {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g} of any Navigator power, enemies have their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} reduced by −{uip|ResistancePenalty|79abfcdecc5f434b80214d0c8647fe3e}. This reduction is increased by the {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}devastating{/g} parameter of the Navigator's staff but does not stack.

While under the effect of any Navigator power, enemies have their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} reduced by −{uip|ResistancePenalty|79abfcdecc5f434b80214d0c8647fe3e}. This reduction is increased by the {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}devastating{/g} parameter of the Navigator's staff but does not stack.

languages.text: Под действием любой силы навигатора противники получают −{uip|ResistancePenalty|79abfcdecc5f434b80214d0c8647fe3e}% к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броне{/g}. Это значение увеличивается за счет параметра "{g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}разрушение{/g}" посоха навигатора, но эффект не суммируется.
languages.original_text: While under the effect of any Navigator power, enemies have their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} reduced by −{uip|ResistancePenalty|79abfcdecc5f434b80214d0c8647fe3e}. This reduction is increased by the {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}devastating{/g} parameter of the Navigator's staff but does not stack.

traits.locale_text: Под действием любой силы навигатора противники получают −<u>(2 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} ВОЛ навигатора)</u>% к броне. Это значение увеличивается за счет параметра "разрушение" посоха навигатора, но эффект не суммируется.

Под действием любой силы навигатора противники получают −<u>(2 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} ВОЛ навигатора)</u>% к броне. Это значение увеличивается за счет параметра "разрушение" посоха навигатора, но эффект не суммируется.

Под действием любой силы навигатора противники получают −{uip|ResistancePenalty|79abfcdecc5f434b80214d0c8647fe3e}% к броне. Это значение увеличивается за счет параметра "разрушение" посоха навигатора, но эффект не суммируется.

languages.text: 所有受到导航者力量影响的敌人{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}降低{uip|ResistancePenalty|79abfcdecc5f434b80214d0c8647fe3e}%。此减值效果会随着导航者法杖{g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}毁灭{/g}属性的提高而提高，但效果无法叠加。
languages.original_text: While under the effect of any Navigator power, enemies have their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} reduced by −{uip|ResistancePenalty|79abfcdecc5f434b80214d0c8647fe3e}. This reduction is increased by the {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}devastating{/g} parameter of the Navigator's staff but does not stack.

traits.locale_text: 所有受到导航者力量影响的敌人，{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}降低<u>（2×导航者的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}）%</u>。此减值效果会随着导航者法杖毁灭属性的提高而提高，但效果无法叠加。
所有受到导航者力量影响的敌人，{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}降低{uip|ResistancePenalty|79abfcdecc5f434b80214d0c8647fe3e}。此减值效果会随着导航者法杖毁灭属性的提高而提高，但效果无法叠加。

languages.text: Mientras estén bajo los efectos de cualquier poder del navegante, la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g} de los enemigos se reduce en −{uip|ResistancePenalty|79abfcdecc5f434b80214d0c8647fe3e}. Esta reducción se ve incrementada por el parámetro {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}devastador{/g} del báculo del navegante, pero no es acumulativa.
languages.original_text: While under the effect of any Navigator power, enemies have their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} reduced by −{uip|ResistancePenalty|79abfcdecc5f434b80214d0c8647fe3e}. This reduction is increased by the {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}devastating{/g} parameter of the Navigator's staff but does not stack.

traits.locale_text: Mientras estén bajo los efectos de cualquier poder del navegante, la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g} de los enemigos se reduce en −{uip|ResistancePenalty|79abfcdecc5f434b80214d0c8647fe3e}. Esta reducción se ve incrementada por el parámetro {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}devastador{/g} del báculo del navegante, pero no es acumulativa.

Mientras estén bajo los efectos de cualquier poder del navegante, la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g} de los enemigos se reduce en −{uip|ResistancePenalty|79abfcdecc5f434b80214d0c8647fe3e}. Esta reducción se ve incrementada por el parámetro devastador del báculo del navegante, pero no es acumulativa.

languages.text: Während sie unter der Auswirkung einer beliebigen Navigatorkraft stehen, wird die {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g} von Feinden um −{uip|ResistancePenalty|79abfcdecc5f434b80214d0c8647fe3e} reduziert. Diese Verringerung wird durch den {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}Verheerend{/g}-Parameter des Navigatorstabs erhöht, wird aber nicht gestacked.
languages.original_text: While under the effect of any Navigator power, enemies have their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} reduced by −{uip|ResistancePenalty|79abfcdecc5f434b80214d0c8647fe3e}. This reduction is increased by the {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}devastating{/g} parameter of the Navigator's staff but does not stack.

traits.locale_text: Während sie unter der Auswirkung einer beliebigen Navigatorkraft stehen, wird die {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g} von Feinden um −{uip|ResistancePenalty|79abfcdecc5f434b80214d0c8647fe3e} reduziert. Diese Verringerung wird durch den {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}Verheerend{/g}-Parameter des Navigatorstabs erhöht, stapelt sich aber nicht.

Während unter der Auswirkung einer beliebigen Navigatorkraft wird die {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g} von Gegnern um −{uip|ResistancePenalty|79abfcdecc5f434b80214d0c8647fe3e} reduziert. Diese Verringerung wird durch den Verwüstungsparameter des Navigatorstabs erhöht, kann aber nicht aufaddiert werden.

languages.text: L'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} des ennemis qui sont sous l'effet d'un pouvoir du navigateur est réduite de −{uip|ResistancePenalty|79abfcdecc5f434b80214d0c8647fe3e}. Cette réduction est accentuée par la {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}Dévastation{/g} du bâton du Navigateur, mais n'est pas cumulable.
languages.original_text: While under the effect of any Navigator power, enemies have their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} reduced by −{uip|ResistancePenalty|79abfcdecc5f434b80214d0c8647fe3e}. This reduction is increased by the {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}devastating{/g} parameter of the Navigator's staff but does not stack.

traits.locale_text: L'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} des ennemis qui sont sous l'effet d'un pouvoir du Navigateur est réduite de -<u>(2 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}VOL{/g} du Navigateur)</u>. Cette réduction est accentuée par le paramètre Dévastation du bâton du Navigateur mais n'est pas cumulable.

L'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} des ennemis qui sont sous l'effet d'un pouvoir du Navigateur est réduite de -{uip|ResistancePenalty|79abfcdecc5f434b80214d0c8647fe3e}. Cette réduction est accentuée par le paramètre Dévastation du bâton du Navigateur mais n'est pas cumulable.

languages.text: 航宙士のいずれかの効果を受けている間、敵の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}が −{uip|ResistancePenalty|79abfcdecc5f434b80214d0c8647fe3e}減少する。この減少効果は、航宙士の杖の{g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}壊滅{/g}能力によって増加するが、スタックしない。
languages.original_text: While under the effect of any Navigator power, enemies have their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} reduced by −{uip|ResistancePenalty|79abfcdecc5f434b80214d0c8647fe3e}. This reduction is increased by the {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}devastating{/g} parameter of the Navigator's staff but does not stack.

traits.locale_text: 航宙士のいずれかの効果を受けている間、敵の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}が −{uip|ResistancePenalty|79abfcdecc5f434b80214d0c8647fe3e}減少する。この減少効果は、航宙士の杖の{g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}壊滅{/g}能力によって増加するが、スタックしない。
航宙士のいずれかの効果を受けている間、敵の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}が −{uip|ResistancePenalty|79abfcdecc5f434b80214d0c8647fe3e}される。この減少効果は、航宙士の杖の廃滅能力によって増加するが、累積しない。

languages.text: Herhangi bir Rotacı gücünün etkisi altındayken, düşmanların {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}zırhları{/g} {uip|ResistancePenalty|79abfcdecc5f434b80214d0c8647fe3e} kadar azalır. Bu azalma miktarı, Rotacı'nın asasının {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}yıkıcı{/g} parametresi tarafından artırılır ancak üst üste birikmez.
languages.original_text: While under the effect of any Navigator power, enemies have their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} reduced by −{uip|ResistancePenalty|79abfcdecc5f434b80214d0c8647fe3e}. This reduction is increased by the {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}devastating{/g} parameter of the Navigator's staff but does not stack.
